title: How to Follow a Person or Page on Facebook's Website or Mobile App

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. It's a dark blue app with a white "f". This will open your Facebook News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password to continue.

steps.title: Search for the person or page you want to follow.
steps.content: Search for the person or page you want to follow. Type the name of the person or page you want to follow into the search bar at the top of the screen, then tap the name of the person or page when it appears in the drop-down menu. Some people, such as celebrities and other public figures, have "Follow" buttons on their pages.

steps.title: Tap Follow.
steps.content: Tap Follow . It's below the user's name near the top of the page. If you're trying to follow a page, you'll need to tap the three-dot menu button first, then tap Follow .

steps.title: Tap Follow again to change the settings.
steps.content: Tap Follow again to change the settings. You can change the type of notifications you get from following someone by tapping one of the following: Default - You will see this person's/page's updates in your News Feed. See First - This person's/page's updates will appear at the top of your News Feed when available. Unfollow - Stop following this person/page.

steps.title: Go to Facebook's website.
steps.content: Go to Facebook's website. Go to https://www.facebook.com in your preferred browser. This will load your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't already logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password before continuing.

steps.title: Search for the person or page you want to follow.
steps.content: Search for the person or page you want to follow. Type the person's or page's name into the search bar at the top of the News Feed page, then click the profile picture to go to their profile or page.

steps.title: Click Follow.
steps.content: Click Follow . It's below the bottom-left corner of the cover photo. If you're trying to follow a page, you'll need to click the three-dot menu button first, then click Follow .

steps.title: Click Follow again to change the settings.
steps.content: Click Follow again to change the settings. A drop-down menu will appear with the following options: Unfollow This Page - Unfollow the person/page. See First - See this person's/page's updates at the top of your News Feed when available. Default - See this person's/page's updates in your News Feed. Unfollow - Unfollow the person/page.
